title: The Weight of the Crown
description: The Dwarf King of Kazan-Dun has fallen to the goblin invasion. His body lies captive in the goblin stronghold, where the Goblin King plans to consume it in a dark ritual. Without the king's body, the dwarves cannot perform proper burial rites - and cannot crown a new king. Recover the fallen king's body and help decide the fate of the kingdom.

objectives.description: Descend to the Deep Vaults where the Goblin King holds court
Recover the Dwarf King's body from the ritual cage
Return the king's body to Regent Borin in the Great Hall
